New Records: Zack Wheeler is 3-0 with a 2.08 ERA in four postseason starts this year, striking out 34 and walking two in 26 innings.
Key Match Events: Bryce Harper slid home in a collision with catcher Gabriel Moreno as part of a double steal that built a 2-0 lead in the first.

Pre-Game Insights: For Game 5, Philadelphia RHP Zach Wheeler (2-0, 2.37 ERA postseason) starts Saturday night against RHP Zac Gallen (2-1, 4.96 ERA).
Post-Match Reflections: Philadelphia moved one win from its second straight World Series appearance, regaining control after wasting late leads in consecutive one-run losses at Chase Field.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series resumes Monday in Philadelphia, where the Phillies are 6-0 this postseason with 17 homers.
Others: The Arizona Diamondbacks rallied to beat the Philadelphia Phillies 2-1 on Thursday and close to 2-1 in the NL Championship Series.
Pre-Game Predictions: Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams.
Post-Game Comments: Aaron Judge did not make any comments as the article is about the Phillies, not the Yankees.
